value.original: An often automatically generated identifier for all documents.

row.value: An often automatically generated identifier for all documents.

value.original: The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>". If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field will be empty when creating a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Document Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table inside the database (e.g. C_Order).

row.value: The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>". If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field will be empty when creating a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Document Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table inside the database (e.g. C_Order).

value.original: A reference or document order number as listed in business partner application.

row.value: A reference or document order number as listed in business partner application.

value.original: This can be used to input a reference for this specific transaction. For example, a Purchase Order number can be input on a Sales Order for easier reference.

row.value: This can be used to input a reference for this specific transaction. For example, a Purchase Order number can be input on a Sales Order for easier reference.

value.original: An often automatically generated identifier for all documents.

The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>". If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field will be empty when creating a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Document Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table inside the database (e.g. C_Order).

row.value: Номер документа, как правило, автоматически генерируется системой и определяется типом документа документа. Если документ не сохраняется, предварительный номер отображается в "<>". Если тип документа не имеет автоматической последовательности, поле будет пустым при создании нового документа. Это для документов, которые обычно имеют внешний номер (например, счета поставщику). Если оставить это поле пустым, система будет генерировать номер документа для Вас. Последовательность документа, используемый для этого резервного числа определяется в окне " Последовательность документа " с именем " № Документа_<имятаблицы>", где имятаблицы является фактическое имя таблицы в базе данных (например, C_Order).

value.original: The amount debited to an account, converted to the organization default currency.

row.value: Сумма дебетуется по счету и пересчитывается в валюте организации.

value.original: The Account Debit Amount indicates the transaction amount converted to this organization's accounting currency

row.value: The Account Debit Amount indicates the transaction amount converted to this organization's accounting currency
